channel.title: Do younger people get less respect than older?
channel.description:
Well, I am not going to lie about my age. I am 13 years old. I do my best to act like I am older and not be a faggot. I have been with moparscape for quite awhile(shorter than I though wow) and well, anyway, here is my question.
Do you think that ages like me would get less respect on these forums (MITB, Mopar) than a oh...16 year old would?
I would think it would depend on behaviour and maturity. I try to be as mature as I possibly can, and I have only acted like a retard a few(maybe in the 20s...) times. I know quite a bit of people who act like me though(That is a good thing kind of =P)
Age doesn't really make a different to me..A 13 year old can say what a 16 year old says and a 13 year old can know what a 16 year old knows.
Anyway, post your opinion.
---Flame war starts here---

item.title: Do younger people get less respect than older?
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

I somewhat base it on age, i think a 10-17 yr old is unstable/unreliable, can change thier mind on things too fast, cry like little bitches and the rest of the shit you see from prepubescent kids over the internet.

However there is 1 in 20 younger ones that i meet, that act more mature than my self at times, i respect those ones and nothing more. (I’m almost 20 btw)

Read full topic
item.source: Do younger people get less respect than older?

item.title: Do younger people get less respect than older?
item.dc:creator: @Gloab Gloab_
item.description:
@Gloab wrote:

[quote=“pk3r john, post:47, topic:255981”][quote author=the fu superior link=topic=338180.msg2720385#msg2720385 date=1237936334]

I actually just turned 11 today :eek:, and I try to act like im 14 or 15.
I think that younger people tend to be more impatient and use bad grammer/spelling which leads to people
disliking them. But I think it’s just how mature they act, etc…

Holy hell. You didn’t read the rules and you lied about your age.
You might aswell be like "I am 11 and [b] u [b\] r not.
Then be like “phree pronz!!! www.adsence.com/ref#iamadouche”
[/quote]

Do you see 11 year olds creating decent servers?
I think not.[/quote]

I do not know what you mean by decent… They’re all the same.

Read full topic

item.title: Do younger people get less respect than older?
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

[quote=“T4_, post:41, topic:255981”][quote]
Wow, the fu just got owned.
How so? He just said it didn’t offend him. It obviously didn’t because I didn’t intend to. Stop talking crap.
Please make some sense before arguing. I honestly have no idea what the above quote is supposed to mean. (Not a flame, being honest.)
[/quote]
Okay, so someone replies that my response to your attempt at flaming ‘owned you’.
You respond with ‘How so, it didn’t offend him?’
– What is that supposed to mean? Did you misread that for ‘T4_ you got owned’?
I respond with the fact you no longer make any sense.

TBH admitting you don’t understand the rebuttal and making an argument makes your argument invalid.

Because your rebuttal was illogical in this conversation; and no, it is valid.[/quote]
I don’t have time to MS paint you a picture so I’ll make it short and sweet.

  1. He says “z0mg if u dunt liek wut pplz say den walk away”
  2. I said hurtful things to show that he wouldn’t have walked away.
  3. He didn’t got offended by the example I used, which didn’t disprove my point, because I wasn’t really trying to offend him.
  4. You say I got owned.
  5. I try to explain it.
  6. You make a stupid post.
  7. I make a stupid reply to your stupid post

Read full topic
item.source: Do younger people get less respect than older?

Okay, so someone replies that my response to your attempt at flaming 'owned you'. You respond with 'How so, it didn't offend him?' [i]-- What is that supposed to mean? Did you misread that for 'T4_ you got owned'?[/i] I respond with the fact you no longer make any sense.
the fu superior:

TBH admitting you don’t understand the rebuttal and making an argument makes your argument invalid.

Because your rebuttal was illogical in this conversation; and no, it is valid.

item.title: Do younger people get less respect than older?
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

[quote=“T4_, post:39, topic:255981”][quote author=the fu superior link=topic=338180.msg2714930#msg2714930 date=1237579708]

16 year olds can still be immature faggots too.

You’re racist. Which is a lot worse.

Everything is classed as racist though, I complain about immigration and all of a sudden I’m a racist.

What ever happened to “sticks and stones may break my bones, but words will never hurt me”? That’s what I was brought up to believe.

People are overly sensitive for some reason. I agree with you; if they don’t like what they hear, they should walk away. Besides, discrimination is human nature; thus racism is also human nature.

Cock sucking piece of shit. go fuck your mother and your sister.
If I had seriously intended to offend you, you wouldn’t have “walked away” you would’ve said something back.

You didn’t offend me; and by the comment you just made, you’ve proved to me you did not read my comment.

Wow, the fu just got owned.

How so? He just said it didn’t offend him. It obviously didn’t because I didn’t intend to. Stop talking crap.
[/quote]
Please make some sense before arguing. I honestly have no idea what the above quote is supposed to mean. (Not a flame, being honest.)[/quote]
TBH admitting you don’t understand the rebuttal and making an argument makes your argument invalid.

Read full topic

[quote=“Chassy13, post:1, topic:255981”]Well, I am not going to lie about my age. I am 13 years old. I do my best to act like I am older and not be a faggot. I have been with moparscape for quite awhile(shorter than I though wow) and well, anyway, here is my question.

Do you think that ages like me would get less respect on these forums (MITB, Mopar) than a oh…16 year old would?

I would think it would depend on behaviour and maturity. I try to be as mature as I possibly can, and I have only acted like a retard a few(maybe in the 20s…) times. I know quite a bit of people who act like me though(That is a good thing kind of =P)

Age doesn’t really make a different to me…A 13 year old can say what a 16 year old says and a 13 year old can know what a 16 year old knows.

Anyway, post your opinion.

item.title: Do younger people get less respect than older?
item.dc:creator: @maniown maniown
item.description:
@maniown wrote:

Think about people like your grandparents, they have lived multiple times as long as you and have either done good or bad things. Over time they most likely got respected/hated. So i think if a younger kid does a large amount of good deeds then yes, they could be respected.
